info.title: Email Migration API v2
info.description: Email Migration API lets you migrate emails of users to Google backends.

post.description: Insert Mail into Google's Gmail backends

parameters.name: userKey
parameters.description: The email or immutable id of the user

MailItem.description: JSON template for MailItem object in Email Migration API.

isDeleted.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is deleted (used in Vault)

isDraft.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is draft

isInbox.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is in inbox

isSent.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is in 'sent mails'

isStarred.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is starred

isTrash.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is in trash

isUnread.description: Boolean indicating if the mail is unread

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.name: key
key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.name: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/email.mi: Manage email messages of users on your domain
